name: Organization; quorum; meetings
text: [§6F-4]  Organization; quorum; meetings.  The board shall elect from its own membership, a chairperson and a vice-chairperson.  The board shall meet at least four times a year and a majority of all members to which the board is entitled shall constitute a quorum to do business.  The board shall adopt such rules as are necessary in carrying out the purposes of this chapter. [L 1990, c 211, pt of §3]
